items.name: The Akure Canvas Gallery
items.short_description: A vibrant space showcasing contemporary Nigerian art and emerging local talent, with rotating exhibitions and workshops. It's a must-visit for art enthusiasts and culture lovers.
items.address: 15 Oba Adesida Road, Akure, Ondo State

items.name: Ignite Akure Innovation Hub
items.short_description: A cutting-edge co-working and innovation space fostering tech startups and digital skills development in Akure. It's a vibrant community for entrepreneurs and tech enthusiasts.

items.name: Kids' Kingdom Fun Centre
items.short_description: An exciting indoor play area and arcade for children of all ages, offering safe and engaging activities. Perfect for family outings and birthday parties.

items.name: Akure Bites Food Park
items.short_description: A vibrant open-air food park featuring diverse culinary stalls, live music, and a relaxed atmosphere. Discover local delicacies and international flavors.

items.name: Serenity Eco Gardens
items.short_description: A beautifully landscaped botanical garden offering tranquil walking paths, diverse plant collections, and a breath of fresh air. Ideal for nature lovers and relaxation.
items.address: FUTA South Gate Road, Akure, Ondo State

items.name: Akure Sky Adventures
items.short_description: An exhilarating outdoor adventure park featuring ziplining, obstacle courses, and canopy walks. Get your adrenaline pumping and enjoy the natural surroundings.
items.address: Idanre Hills Road, Akure, Ondo State

items.name: Grand Cinemas Akure
items.short_description: Akure's newest state-of-the-art multiplex cinema offering the latest blockbusters in comfortable, modern auditoriums. Enjoy a premium movie-watching experience.
items.address: Shoprite Mall, Alagbaka, Akure, Ondo State

items.name: The Zenith Grand Hotel & Sky Lounge
items.short_description: A luxurious boutique hotel offering upscale accommodation and a chic rooftop bar with panoramic city views. Experience refined elegance and vibrant nightlife.

items.name: Oasis Wellness & Spa
items.short_description: A serene sanctuary offering a range of spa treatments, massages, and holistic wellness programs. Rejuvenate your mind, body, and spirit in a tranquil environment.
items.address: Adegbemile Cultural Centre Road, Akure, Ondo State

items.name: Akure Champions Sports Arena
items.short_description: A modern multi-purpose sports complex featuring pitches for football and basketball, a well-equipped gym, and fitness classes. Promoting community health and sports.
